text: Have you ever heard of Save the Children?
I have not. What can you tell me about it?
It is an international non-governmental organisation. It promotes children's rights
That sounds interesting. I am all for helping children in any way possible.
Would you be interested in donating to this charity?
I would want to do some research first but that would be a possibility. I like to learn as much as I can about an organization before donating.
Kids are dying from hunger every minute. Don't you want to help stop that?
Of course I do. I also want to make sure my donations are not going into the pockets of money hungry CEO's. How do you feel about that?
I understand, but I can assure you that is goes directly to the kids.
How can you assure me? Do you work for them?
I do not, but they are a very professional organization. It is an international company.
Save the Children International's CEO Helle Thorning-Schmidt earned $299,136 in 2017. Simple Google search.
That isn't a lot for a CEO.
No its not. However, that is only salary. It doesnt include extras that all CEO's receive.
There isn't a lot of support for children in developing countries. This should make you mad and want to help.
Have you personally donated?
Yes, why don't you join me?
That is impossible at this time. I just do not have the funds available.
How much do you like to donate to the charity now? Your donation will be directly deducted from your task payment. You can choose any amount from $0 to all your payment."
I chose to donate $0.
